activities:
Numerex Corp. delivers wireless services, technology and products for the development and support of Machine-to-Machine (M2M) solutions for business and government worldwide.  M2M communications employs a device (e.g., sensor, meter, etc.) to capture an "event" (e.g., temperature, inventory level, location, environment status, etc.), which is relayed through a network (e.g., wireless, wired or hybrid) to an application (software program), translating the captured event into usable information (e.g., there is a breach, corrosion requires attention, items need to be restocked, an accident has occurred, etc.).  

Our customers may use our solutions to collect and/or transmit data, potential sensitive and/or private in nature, to capture and event.  Customers provide us with their respective contact information, mainly for billing purposes.  Our Privacy Policy Statement states what information is used and retained.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Numerex Corp. directs individuals with concerns or complaints about the use or disclosure of personal information to contact our Privacy Compliance Director.  Numerex Corp. is committed to rigorous adherence to its Privacy Policy Statement.  However, we recognize that, in some circumstances, an individual may not be satisfied with our dispute resolution procedure.  In those circumstances, Numerex Corp. agrees to fully cooperate with the relevant EU data protection authorities (DPAs), as well as the appropriate authorities in the U.S., including the Federal Trade Commission.
